tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I've been seeing Dr(Maj.) Sharad Shrivastava for nearly 20 years,  since I was in my early thirties and have continued to see him now. It was always good to be treated with professionalism and care. He goes out of his way to make sure all your questions are answered. He works with you to address your health concerns, rather than just telling you what to do. He always wants to make sure that you and him are on the same page and comfort level and goes out of his way to care of his patients. Coming here is like dealing with trusted family. 
My family comprises of age group from 14 yrs to 86 yrs and is fit & healthy because of timely advise and medication prescribed by Dr. Shrivastava. My father who is 86 yrs old, always feels so relieved whenever he interacts with Dr Srivastava. Last Sunday my father was feeling anxiety and wanted to visit the clinic. When I called Dr. Shrivastava he immediately responded despite having tight schedule in current scenario. I was so touched. 
I am always thankful to Dr Shrivastava for being my Family doctor.

review:
I have first met Dr Shrivastava 2 years back for my typhoid fever. Later on he bacame our first point contact for any medical emergency. He treated my father during covid time that also at distant state which is highly appreciable. In case of emergency to help his patient he even attended our call in midnight as well. He is the one who saved life of my father.
His dedication and knowledge is remarkable.
Today I've shifted from Delhi but my first point of medical contact is still same. Thank you so much Doc.

tags: None
review: Thanks Dr. Sharad!!!  What a wonderful Recovery with your Treatment..Thankfully i booked an appointment with him and i got it. I had chest pain for last couple of days and i  consulted  in Hospitals also , but unfortunately i was not getting relief. I reached to him with my different reports and when i reached prior to my appointment, therefore there were  a couple of Patients waiting.thankfully my consultation started in time . i was tense because i was suffering from Cardiac Problem , but i was very comfortable while interacting with Dr. Shrivastava. He heard me completely then he asked few questions . he saw my reports  thoroughly and examined me  with all his patience I found a great satisfaction with his approach.I found a Complete Doctor in him.He modified few of my Medicine which i was taking , and with due rectification in the treatment , i am better. My Chest pain Has gone.Now i am my normal routine.Thanks to him..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was pretty bad. Doctor after checking for the fever we also told him that headache is also there etc. Doctor then gave a prescription for the medicine and told us to get corona test done. on one hand he gave prescription for medicine which coated almost 1k. The next day we got the test done once the result came positive we tried contacting the doctor we have been told that doctor is se busy attending patients who have come too the clinic. they also told us that doctor will call back once he gets free. today is the second day the doctor is still busy. ** ***** **** ** *** * ******** ********** ***** **** ********* *** *** ** *** ***** ** *** ******** * ****** * ****** *** *** ******** ********** **** **** *** **** *********** ** *** ******** *** * *** *** complete let down. my recommendation is to avoid going to this doctor
reply_text:
Dear Mr. Balachandran we regret to hear that you were dissatisfied by the health care services provided to you.
We understand your wife and son were walking in Patients without any prior appointment. Please understand that as health care workers we try and ensure every patient gets proper attention and care. However there tends to be instances like the one you described once in a while.
We try to better ourselves every time. The Patient attendant Mr. Balachandran doesn't have patience and his behavior was found inhuman to a man as well as to a Doctor. As a Physician one may be busy busy and occupied. It happened many times that Doctor do not live a normal routine family life and his family remains neglected. Mr. Balachandran wanted immediate attention by giving 2 calls to my reception on the very next day of his visit wanted neglection of  other Patients , who were already in the que for the treatment. He did not even tried to contact even on the very next day of his calls if he was really interested in seeking medical advice or had any emergency . Neither he sent anyone to my office for immediate attention nor tried to contact my office or me ,  if there was any life threatening condition. I think that his behavior was very irrelevant and has taken Doctors and Medical professional granted for order and serve basis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Sharad Shrivastava treated me and my family for SARS-CoV-2.
He is extremely ************* *** experienced and is able to diagnose the problems even on online consultation so aptly.

It is very rare to find such a kind, compassionate and friendly doctor.
We were infected at the peak of pandemic when the medical fraternity was highly busy and exhausted. 
I am so thankful to doctor Sharad that he responded to each and every call of us and explained everything in great detail even after being highly busy and occupied.

He is a wonderful person. I have great respect for him.
I wish him all the success and happiness in life. 

I highly recommend doctor Sharad Shrivastava to everyone.
reply_text:
Thanks Dear
Thanks for the complement

reply_text:
I think that you had been given due attention and you must be human to understand that A Doctor may receive emergency call in this Digital world.And you had been told that Mother's milk can be given because it contains Antibodies too against Infections.You must understand that Doctor promotes medicine which are actually required to the Patient.
I feel sorry about any miscommunication, misunderstanding and the pain you felt.
Thanks and best wishes

review: Thanks Doctor!!!!!!...i was really very tense with my Father's Heart Problem.He has been suffering for this problem for a long . All family members were anxious due to my father's sickness because he was the only earninging Member . I took an appointment with Dr Shrivastava. We met him with my Father. He heard our problem and saw the various papers and documents of Govt. Hospitals. He examined my Father thoroughly and did one ECG. After that he wrote a prescription. My Father took  medicines prescribed by him . He started feeling better and started  going back on the  Job. We once again revived and came out of Shock we suffered. The medicines prescribed by him were not much costly. we could afford such cheaper and beneficial medicines. I really thanks so much Dr. Shrivastva for his great contribution and recommend my friends to visit him in case of any medical crisis.

review: What a wonderful setup!!!! I met him  when i started feeling fatigue ,Weight gain and roughness on my skin . My Friend took me to him.I  got an appointment with help of him. I entered the Clinic in time and my consultation started in time.Dr. shrivastava talked to me and heard all my problems . he suggested me some tests and i got it done with the help of his assistants. In my Next appointment , he prescribed me 2 drugs . i was very please because when ever i visited any of the Doctor , he used to give me number of medicines.I took his treatment   and within couple of days i started feeling recovered and my symptoms abolished .I found a great person who is polite , considerate, thoroughly professional and a Doctor who prescribes less no. of medicine. tags: None
review:
Thanks I met him, wow what a great professional skill. I got an appointment with him with efforts of my friend .Although people were waiting but due to an appointment, i entered in his Chamber in time.
Excellent charming personality polite n professional approach. Dr Shrivastava is a good Physician Diabetologist with High professional skill. tags: None
review:
I am greatly amazed by the professionalism and knowledge of Dr. Sharad Shrivastava. I was suffering from high grade fever for almost one month, my fever was on n' off kind, I had already seen 7-8 doctors before him and I must say I have recovered in a couple of days by taking only a couple of drugs prescribed by him. 
He listened to me patiently and answered all my questions and health concerns as I was deeply worried about my health due to one whole month of unpleasant health and suffering. I couldn't go to my office on many important days but now I feel way more healthier than before.
I highly recommend him if you are looking for a great General Physician in Dwarka.

tags: None
review:
He is a wonderful Doctor!Thankfully I had booked an appointment at 12:30 on Thursday as the waiting was already occupied before I entered.Yet it started well in time.I had high B.P. and was suffering from anxiety,he made me feel very comfortable and talked in a friendly manner throughout the check-up.He patiently explained me  my ailment, he prescribed me some great medicines from which I recovered withing a couple of days.
The clinic was hygienic and well maintained.
Dr. Sharad Srivastava is very friendly, professional and understanding as he listens to the patient very well and lets them feel very comfortable. He prescribed me only two medicines and I believe it's his professionalism that made me feel more better than the medicines. I surely recommend him to other patients who are looking for a good General Physician in Delhi. Thanks to Dr. Sharad Srivastava

tags: None
review: I was suffering from high grade fever for last 4 days n for that i met to a local doctor near to my house . My Fever was not coming down with his medicine. I was really scared and tensed. I saw list of Doctors on Practo. i  booked an appointment with Dr. Shrivastava. When i reached there , i found a good establishment. Since i had an appointment it took very less time to meet Dr. Sharad. I was very comfortable with him because he gave me ample time to speak. Then he asked me some questions and examined me fully.He wrote a prescription having only 3 drugs. I was really satisfied with the approach taken by the Doctor. It took hardly one day to recover and now i am feeling much better and went back on my regular routine and job. Dr. Shrivastava is really polite, a good listener and have great patience to hear the Patient. I am really happy and recommend others to meet him in case of genuine medical consultation.

reply_text: You were sitting in Bangluru and booked appointment for your Brother. And top of that, You gave feedback.Have you ever asked about for whom have you consulted for? Do you know that how many times I called or reciprocated to your brother? If you did not involve in the whole process then you do not have any right to give such a feedback.
